meanings.definition: A bract or scale-like structure that surrounds the base of a flower head.
meanings.sent1: The phyllaries protect the flower head.
meanings.sent2: The phyllaries give the flower a unique appearance.
meanings.sent3: The phyllaries decided to have a party around the flower head.
meanings.sent4: The phyllaries stood guard like loyal knights around the flower head.
meanings.sent5: The phyllaries were like a colorful fence enclosing the flower head.

meanings.definition: The outermost layer of the involucre of a composite flower.
meanings.sent1: She carefully examined the phyllaries of the composite flower.
meanings.sent2: The phyllaries of the composite flower were green and leaf-like.
meanings.sent3: The phyllaries of the composite flower whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The phyllaries of the composite flower were like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The phyllaries of the composite flower danced in the wind, creating a mesmerizing display.
